II.i.2.D.5.b
.
Who Has Jurisdiction Over Restricted-Access Mail
With few exceptions, mail related to claims filed by VBA employees and their relatives require restricted-access handling by the St. Paul Restricted Access Claims Center (RACC) for compensation claims, and by the St. Paul PMC RACC for pension and survivor claims.
Reference
:  For more information on claims handled by RACCs, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 2.B
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Handling Specific Types of Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
